publication.title: OutlierD: an R package for outlier detection using quantile regression on mass spectrometry data
publication.authors: hyungjun cho,yang-jin kim,hee jung jung,jae won lee
publication.keyword: Mass Spectrometry;Outlier Detection;Proteome Analysis;Quantile Regression;High Throughput;
publication.abstract: Summary: It is important to preprocess high-throughput data generated from mass spectrometry experiments in order to obtain a successful proteomics analysis. Outlier detection is an important preprocessing step. A naive outlier detection approach may miss many true outliers and instead select many non-outliers because of the heterogeneity of the variability observed commonly in high- throughput data. Because of this issue,
